website_summaries.verdict: We like the Panasonic DMP-BD45, but, despite its good performance, its lack of Profile 2.0 support is inexcusable.
pros: Attractive styling Good remote control Excellent picture quality

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Blu-ray Player
customer_reviews.text: I went from a Panasonic DVD player which was stunning visual to this Panasonic Blu-ray which sharpened the stunning. The sound is crisp and clear, the picture ranging from poor quality to great quality original filming remains that way but with a high quality appearance. New Blu-ray viewing is stunning. Older good quality movies such as earliest Disney movies that are not Blu-ray are sharp with deeper colors and great sound. Movies that I had taped then transferred to DVD play beautifully, again depending on the original quality.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to set up to my non-HD RCA television set by supplied RCA plugs. On-screen set up took minutes and it was ready to play a movie, which I enjoyed immediately. Owner's manual quick start instructions were simple to understand. I have had this player for about a month and watch at least one movie a week, DVD or Blu-ray. Just a great, basic disc player. I particularly enjoy the availiablity of the SD memory stick feature. The player recognizes the stick immediately and in a few seconds I am watching my photos on the TV screen. Thanks, Amazon and Panasonic!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Parrinello

customer_reviews.title: Great Basic Blu-Ray Player
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this player for my dad, who refused to part with his DVD player that he bought when DVDs first surfaced. It's easy to use, and offers great quality for an even better price. There aren't really any bells and whistles along with this model, but for somebody who just wants a simple player for a great price, easy to use, and fantastic quality, then I would recommend this to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: C. H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It syncs with our Panasonic TV. So when we pop in a DVD, we don't have to set everything up to play DVD's, it instantly starts playing the DVD. Love the blue ray. It also plays non-blue ray discs which is nice. And the load time is faster than previous DVD players we've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Blu-Ray DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: The blu-ray player does not seem as fast as the ads would have us believe, but it is fast enough.It plays blu-ray disks beautifully. It also plays ordinary DVD disks beautifully. I believe the excellence with ordinary DVDs is due to playing them progressive not interlaced, but I am uncertain. The excellence is sufficient where I have canceled asking for blu-ray disks from netflix. Ordinary disks are good enough.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Geyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Blu-Ray player !
customer_reviews.text: Like the first reviewer, this is my first Blu-Ray player. I wanted a quality, no-frills model and I don't need or want internet conectivity at this time. So far, this Blu-Ray player has worked beautifully. I don't know how fast (or slow) other Blu-ray players are, but the Panasonic seems just as speedy (or slow depending on your point of view) as my (current model) Sony DVD player. As long as this unit lasts and doesn't give me any trouble down the road, I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angus66

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Blu-ray Player
customer_reviews.text: Great player, so clear on Blu-ray discs and upconversion for Dvd discs. As far the "Ultrafast-Booting" that's over blown. Dvd loading is very good but Blu-ray discs have so much more information to load so it is not "Ultrfast-Booting"
customer_reviews.author: Relaxng

customer_reviews.title: almost great
customer_reviews.text: For us, one measure of the quality of a disk player is how well it handles scratched disks, as one often gets by rental. While some disks are scratched beyond all hope, some will play only in better quality players. I have seen two scratched rental DVDs that fail in this player (Panasonic BD45) but still play in our kids XBox 360. And that is with the most recent firmware update. Other than that, it is a great player at a very good price. It has handled all of the Blu-Ray disks we've tried very well.
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great no frills blu ray player
customer_reviews.text: I really like this player. I would not say it is ultra fast in loading but do like the features with the display and audio. It communicates well with my Samsung tv and home theater. I bought this because my Samsung blu ray player was not working right even with up grades and wanted a new blu ray to play with the speaker system, plug in and it works just great. If you do not need any internet accesss, this is the player I would get and the price is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Dug

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy and works well.
customer_reviews.text: I havnt had the product to long but it works well. It allows me to watch RAM discs I have recorded on a bigger Panasonic unit and watch them in another room/TV. It plays other DVDs & Blu-ray very well, the price is resonable. this unit fits my needs to a tee.
customer_reviews.author: LONGPLAY

customer_reviews.title: First Time Buyer
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Blue-Ray player. It is real simple to use and the fast boot is very convenient. There are not many features to speak of, but the picture and sound are great. If you are not using an HDMI cable you will have to resort to old school RCA cables. You know, like the ones that were cutting edge on an 8-bit Nintendo. I do really like how the controls integrate with my Panasonic TV.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Blue-ray player
customer_reviews.text: I never knew what I was missing until I upgraded to this player. All Blu-ray discs load fast and look great. My older non-blu-ray DVDs are upgraded by the software to higher res just by using this system. I was resisting the technology change for a long time, but I am so glad I made the move to upgrade. Which I had done this sooner!!!
customer_reviews.author: 70s dude

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to work with a Home Theater Audio System, SC-HTB500, and a Panasonic TC-P42G25 TV. It seems to work very well. The only burp is that it seems to be sensitive to the electric baseboard heaters that are installed in my family room. The interference rendors the unit unwatchable and unlistenable. However, with the heaters off and with a blanket and an extra pair of socks on our feet the unit works very well. As has been mentioned by other reviewers, the remote is cool. The limited functionality of the Blu-ray DVD Player is perfect for our needs because the TV includes the bells & whistles.
customer_reviews.author: TopNovice1

customer_reviews.title: Blu-Ray DVD Player - Excellent Unit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bargain . . . . . . this blu-ray dvd player loads quickly, has many desirable features and even has a slot in front for the card from my camera. A quality product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Working great.
customer_reviews.text: We are more than three years into the use of this unit. It has performed flawlessly for us. It plays blue rays and DVDs without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Goggil

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic DMP-BD45 Ultrafast-Booting Blu-ray Disc Player (Black)
customer_reviews.text: Grand kids love. the wife and I don't use it much. But the grand kids use it real regular and with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: chewy

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Blu-ray Disc Player
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Panasonic DMP-BD45 Blu-ray Disc Player & have been very happy with it! Shipment was fast & it arrived in perfect condition. I would recommend this item to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: ninax6

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I bought it years ago, used, and it still works!
customer_reviews.author: V. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Blu-ray player for an awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Blu-ray player from Amazon and recieved it yesterday. I was quite impressed with what it did to the quality of a burned dvd when i watched it on my lcd tv. Watching a blu-ray movie just blew my mind. It is an awesome product for an awesome price. You would be quite pleased with this product. All I can say is Merry Christmas to me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Blue-ray DVD player
customer_reviews.text: These is perhaps one of the best products I have bought from Amazon this season. The player functions perfectly, the picture is crystal clear, and the features so far work perfectly. We bought a Panasonic 46 inch television first and this player fits its format perfectly. I definetely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Davo

customer_reviews.title: First Blu-Ray
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Blu-Ray player and I'm impressed with the difference in picture quality compared to my old DVD player. Glad I waited to purchase as the prices are coming down and I got mine at a steal for 59.99. I recommend this player for anyone just wanting to upgrade to Blu-Ray.
customer_reviews.author: L T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived at time and with all the features and I thank you for the excellent package. Wish you the best.
customer_reviews.author: Debora Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: why pay more
customer_reviews.text: always had good luck with panasonic products, and this no exception. fast booting and recognizes all media that I put in. couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Lauber

customer_reviews.title: nice player
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice entry level player. picture and sound are good for both blue ray and standard dvd.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wittig

customer_reviews.title: Deal of the Day...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when it was the deal of the day a few months ago! Of course... it is cheaper now than when i purchased... but either way it is a great way to start your blu-ray experience. The only feature it lacks is networking (wi-fi), but when you are using it to watch a blu-ray disc it doesn't matter. Also, I now use this to play all of my DVD's as well... it decodes them much better than a DVD player and the picture looks better!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Corcoran Jr.

customer_reviews.title: we like it
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect blu-ray... it small and thin and does exactly what we need it to do this is a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: moniqueZ

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should
customer_reviews.text: The remote feels nice, and the player does what it is supposed to do. Playback of AVCHD on memory cards is a nice touch for anyone with a camera that records in that format. For a budget product, this does seem to perform well, and I haven't had any major issues with playback of any supported media. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: BAD NEWS
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 12/2010. Plays some Blue Rays OK, not all. Unit refuses to play the main feature of several BluRays that play fine on my Sony and Samsung units. It plays the disc intro/ menu, then when you go to chapter 1 you get "Format Unsupported". NOT a region code issue. Support said "Update the Firmware." I did, to V 1.70, (came with V 1.33) still gives the same "Format Unsupported" message. GARBAGE. Save your $.
customer_reviews.author: Dany

customer_reviews.title: Great price solid product
customer_reviews.text: I've only put a few dvds and blurays through this so far but it really is a great player. Very quick to load, fast remote response and a nice array of options for the price. Please note that this player doesn't come with an HDMI cable so buy one on amazon (much cheaper than local.) You'll be pleased overall. Sidenote.. shipping on this particular item was quite slow but I attribute it to the holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffmguida

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Blu-Ray player. I wanted a new model (2010) but was not interested in the BD Live features. This deck has the legendary Panasonic image processor (the same as in the expensive, top of the line models) but at a very low price. Speed is not quite as fast as advertised but better than earlier models. A great deck for anyone who doesn't need BD-Live features.
customer_reviews.author: BoldRuler75

customer_reviews.title: I love this item.  Great price and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: This Blueray is great. I love everything about it. It did not take long to receive it. It does not take up much room, easy to use. It has extra things that it is capable of doing also. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: rfmcd1234

customer_reviews.title: No BD-Live
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware. This unit is not a Profile 2.0. Therefore it is not capable of performing internet updates or BD-Live. It is only a regular BluRay player. However, for a guest room it is good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Pachas-Luna

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: this is a great blu ray player, also works with my television well because its also panasonic. viera link allows me to operate both with one remote. amazing quality and great price
customer_reviews.author: dpiard

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first blu-ray player....what can I say for the price!! Plays regular dvd's real well, haven't bought any blu-ray movies yet. But I will soon to see what the big difference is. Great buy...cant beat that!
customer_reviews.author: CheyLuv

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My first Blu-ray and it is awsome. Easy to operate. Excellent picture. I would recommend this to anyone. The price was good too.
customer_reviews.author: PapaJoe

customer_reviews.title: Initial review of Panasonic DMP-BD45
customer_reviews.text: In most cases it is premature to review any hardware item with such short and limited usage. However, it may be useful to others to know that my initial setup and usage of the DMP-BD45 was flawless. I merely took it out of the box and plug it into a HDMI cable connected to a Sony Bravia 52" TV. I would have liked to give this product a 5 star rating, but would like to use it for six months just in case something shows up that would warrant something else. I wish all electronic products were this easy to get up and running.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth T. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Good basic blu-ray player.
customer_reviews.text: Boots fast, especially using quick-boot feature. Have only watched 1 blu-ray and a few std dvd's so far, but no problems. Would have liked to have Pandora, but price was right for basic player.
customer_reviews.author: Larryorhi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent DVD and MP3 playback
customer_reviews.text: Works well and quickly, but not as fast as advertised. I also purchased a JVC recently and I liked it slightly better.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Seda

customer_reviews.title: Great for the guest bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the guest bedroom, perfect for my needs there. Small size, nice picture, nice sound connected to. Much faster load time than the Panasonic BD55 in my main home theater.
customer_reviews.author: louiseb

customer_reviews.title: it works well
customer_reviews.text: It does everything that it is supposed to. I wish it had a slow mode tho
customer_reviews.author: Martin Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Good Player at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this player when on sale for about $80.00. It works great and I've had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: W. McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Panansonic Blu-ray Player
customer_reviews.text: I received my order in just a couple days. I've watched a couple movies and am happy with the quality. For the price, I think it's a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Could be Better!
customer_reviews.text: I must say a bit let down by this player. Audio performance is pathetic the out put fails to provide a decent signal to the sound bar or set. Picture quality is decent and load speed is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: Be Sure to read the reviews.  I was too busy, bought too fast.
customer_reviews.text: Was sure I read everything before purchasing, but was so disappointed when I hooked up and found it doesn't do streaming. I couldn't get Netflix! Returning is inconvenient, so I gave to my son, who doesn't do streaming. He gave me the model that does and I love it. Usually buy Samsung products, but this was one of Amazon's incredible prices, so I didn't read the reviews or would have read it didn't. Sorry took so long to correct and even sorrier that some people, under the guise of discussion, have to personally attack.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with Proscan 37"
customer_reviews.text: This blu-ray player worked fine and looked great on other tvs, but when brought back to use on my own television, no sound would be transmitted through the HDMI. I called tech support, and talked with them for half an hour only for them to say my tv might not be compatible, so I returned it. So if you have a Proscan tv, I'd be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This DVD player is NOT compatible with Westinghouse brand TVs.
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the Panasonic DMP BD45 Blu Ray player. Beware that this DVD player is NOT compatible with Westinghouse brand TVs which is why I am giving it only one star. Although the player is reasonably, even attractively, priced, it is unreal to me that a world-renowned electronics manufacturer would sell a product that is incompatible with a certain brand of TV--especially one as well known as Westinghouse. FYI: The error code I receive when I attempt to hook up the player to the TV is "U73".
customer_reviews.author: Kate Fulghum

product_meta.title: Panasonic DMP-BD45 Ultrafast-Booting Blu-ray Disc Player (Black)
product_meta.description:
Out of the upcoming Blu-Ray players from Panasonic, the Panasonic DMP-BD45 is the entry-level product and is the most basic model. The player has full 1080p functionality and also up-converts 480i/p and 720p formats up to 1080p. The player has also been designed and manufactured to be as power efficient and environmentally friendly as possible: it uses less power while in use, and while in standby, than previous models and has been sized smaller to save on materials. Panasonic also included PHL Reference Chroma Processor Plus technology with the BD45 to recreate the same image quality that is found in original films. Up-converter - 480/720p to 1080p Audio - 5.1 compatible

AMAZON.COM
Start watching your favorite High-Definition movies almost instantly with the Panasonic DMP-BD45 Blu-ray Disc player, which features an ultra-fast 2-second boot time. It also includes a Secure Digital (SD) memory card slot, making it easy for you to view and share both digital still images and HD video recorded with an HD camcorder in the AVCHD format. 

Other features include compatibility with a wide variety of disc formats (including standard DVD movie discs), PHL Reference Chroma Processor Plus video processing technology (learn more), Energy Star certification, and Panasonic's VIERA Link function--allowing you to operate multiple audio/video components using a single remote via HDMI. Additionally, Panasonic's lineup of 2010 BD Players are designed to reduce power consumption and also feature a slimmer, more efficient design to reduce packaging waste.

 



KEY FEATURES
 * High-quality image processing via PHL Reference Chroma Processor Plus technology 
 * VIERA Link utilizes HDMI to enable control all VIERA Link combatable products with one remote. 
 * SD memory card slot enables you to play your photos and movies taken with digital cameras and camcorders by just sliding in an SD memory card into the SD slot. 

What's in the Box
BD Player, remote control (with batteries), power cord, operating instructions

SPECIFICATIONS


DISC/MEDIA COMPATIBILITY
 

LEARN MORE



EXPERIENCE MOVIES LIKE NEVER BEFORE
The DMP-BD45 employs the PHL Reference Chroma Processor Plus. Developed in collaboration with Panasonic Hollywood Laboratory, this high image processing technology reproduces clear, vivid colors that are faithful to the original film. Panasonic's Blu-ray Disc players employ high precision 4:4:4 signal technology, which working in tandem with PHL Reference Chroma Processor Plus processes each pixel of the Blu-ray Disc video signal in the horizontal direction to compliment vertical direction processing. P4HD (Pixel Precision Progressive Processing for HD) is another technology that contributes to the superior picture quality of the Blu-ray players. P4HD processes more than 15 billion pixels per second and applies the optimal processing to every pixel.

Panasonic's Blu-ray Disc players further utilize 16-level motion detection to categorize the image motion of each pixel into one of 16 levels; diagonal processing to detect diagonals and correct the pixels accordingly; 1080p up-conversion to up-convert content recorded in the 480i/p or 720p format to 1080p.

This Blu-ray Disc player also provides 1080/24p output, reproducing cinema images from a Blu-ray Disc and DVD in their original 24p form with no need for conversion--enabling you to enjoy cinema images in the same format used in cinema with a 1080/24p-compatible TV.
feature_bullets: SDXC/USB Slot for viewing JPEG still and AVCHD video
VieraLink for control with a single remote control

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars64 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
